name: places/ChIJawjTeZlZwokRALnISiygLMo
adrFormatAddress: 795 Broadway, New York, NY 10003, USA

originalText.text: My technician (I believe her name was Ara) was great. Very gentle during the manicure. My nails look very pretty. The place was clean and modern and quiet. No one pressured me into getting anything else done which was nice. I was in and out in a reasonable amount of time and everyone was very attentive. My manicure was $25 which I didn't think was unreasonable for a NYC nail salon. There was another place around the corner charging more than that. It was my birthday so I thought I'd treat myself. I'm glad I went there and will go again!

originalText.text: I wish I read the reviews before I went here. For the prices they charge and the services don’t add up. I went in and got Gel X full set and they came off the next day. I knew they didn’t know what they were doing the second they used regular nail glue to press them on. I’ve done Gel X hundreds of times, they never used nail glue. I tipped 25% also because of the holidays and they really did pamper me, however the work wasn’t it. Sorry. Will not be returning and do not want my money back or a re due. Ladies avoid this place. The reviews are 100% true ☹️

originalText.text: Not worth the price!!  I basically paid $100 for an express mani/pedi.  Since I arrived an hour before closing they decided to rush through the job.  She never soaked my nails, she filed and pushed my cuticles back.  I had to tell her to soak and cut my cuticles.  AFTER I paid, I tried to speak with the owner to express and show her how bad of a job was done and instead of listening she began yelling at me.  Not once did she look at my nails to see if my complaint was valid. My friend gave me a gift card from here so I asked her if I can cash out since I don't plan on returning,  the owner yelled, "NO!", and walked away from me.  I asked her, is this how you treat your clients?. The OWNER mimicked me as she walked away from me and started speaking a foreign language with the staff.  This place is completely unprofessional and overpriced. My nails have small bubbles because she rushed the entire process. Cuticles look horrible.  I wish I could call the cops on them because in all reality, I was robbed of my money. Insane.  They're always empty and now I understand why. I wish I were able to upload pics of my nails so you can see what a bad job was done.  GO AT YOUR OWN RISK!!

originalText.text: Probably the most expensive gel pedicure I have ever gotten in my life. The quality was so below average for a $79 gel pedicure! I’m so disappointed with this. So ridiculous.

text.text: Probably the most expensive gel pedicure I have ever gotten in my life. The quality was so below average for a $79 gel pedicure! I’m so disappointed with this. So ridiculous.

originalText.text: This was my second visit. Rita did my nails and she was wonderful! She made my colorful French nails dreams come true. I decided to add the 10 min massage and Rita worked out a lot of back tension just in that time. I’m so happy with her work and will definitely be back!!
